params._isConfirmed: boolean indicating if data is confirmed

params._lastUpdatedHeadCID: most recent IPFS head CID for associated datasets

params._cid: CID of uploaded KML file on IPFS
params._end: timestamp in 's' of end of desired range
params._isSubscription: boolean indicating if user is subscribed to project
params._start: timestamp in 's' of start of desired range

acceptOwnership().notice: Allows an ownership transfer to be completed by the recipient.

fulfillConfirmData(bytes32,bool).notice: Fulfill a request to confirm data

fulfillDisperseData(bytes32,string,strin.notice: Fulfill a request to disperse data

requestInitialDispersal(bool,uint256,uin.notice: Request an initial dispersal of project data

requestRedispersal(address,string).notice: Request a dispersal of project data that is already initialized

setProjectVerifier(address).notice: Set the address of the ProjectStorageVerifier contract

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows an owner to begin transferring ownership to a new address.

updateProjectState(address,string).notice: Update the state of a project

whitelistUser(address).notice: Add a user address to the whitelist
